body: That's is fixed now too ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/0247795af8aae5b...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/0247795af8aae5bb56561c457b7599f25026825a)). This is because of the new check that I added to make sure user hasn't moved thermal zones using Grasshopper components. I initially wanted to save users some time by calculating less strict bounding boxes but there has been already two reports having this issue so I just changed it to be more accurate. Thanks again.
